titleStmt.title: Practica Walliæ, or, The proceedings in the great sessions of Wales containing the method and practice of an attorney there, from an original to the execution : whereunto is added, the old statute of Wales at large, and an abridgement of all the statutes uniting Wales to England : with tables of the fees, and the matters therein contained / by Rice Vaughan ...
titleStmt.author: Vaughan, Rice.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed for Henry Twyford, John Streater, and Eliz. Flesher, assignes of Richard Atkins and Edwin Atkins, Esquires,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in Cambridge University Library.
